item.title: Building a SatNOGS station: hardware setup
item.description:
Building a SatNOGS station

This article is the first part of the series about building a SatNOGS groundstation. It will address hardware considerations, setup and testing. The second article will focus more onto the software, how to setup a SatNOGS client. The third and last article will illustrate more advanced usages.

Antenna setup

This station will use both VHF and UHF V-dipole antennas.

The UHF antenna will have a ground plane added to improve directivity, improving gain and decreasing interferences from the ground. The VHF antenna will not because of volume constraints.
